description: A collection of circles in a candy cane-shaped formation with the short, curved end on the left; there is a small capital T-shaped formation below that with two slightly curved lines extending downwards from the bottom. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a yellowish-beige triangle in the center of the candy cane-shaped formation and a dark brown at the top of the left line extending from the capital T-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

user.name: VertexArchive

content: December 15, 2023. Hang on to your hat. #NYTVertex
